description: Numbers n such that A003266(n) + 1 is prime.
comments: Next term > 300. - _Joerg Arndt_, Aug 16 2014The corresponding primes are given in A053413. - _Joerg Arndt_, Aug 17 2014
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Fibonacci Number.
prog: (PARI) ff(n)=prod(i=1, n, fibonacci(i));for(n=1,10^6, if(ispseudoprime(ff(n)+1), print1(n,", "))); \\ _Joerg Arndt_, Aug 16 2014
author: _G. L. Honaker, Jr._, Jan 08 2000
